title: WATCH: Soccer player greets his wife, ‘girlfriend’ during post game interview
text:
By: Khristian Ibarrola - Content Strategist / @KIbarrolaINQ INQUIRER.net / 06:38 PM March 20, 2017 Soccer player Mohammed Anas might have been the star of his team’s game last week, but he’s going to have a lot of explaining to do to his wife after he gets home. The Ghanian athlete was named “man of the match” after scoring two goals for the South Africa Free State Stars against the Ajax Cape Town in the Premier Soccer League. ADVERTISEMENT However, his post-game interview was marred with hilarity, as the 22-year-old striker committed a classic “slip of the tongue.” “Firstly, I appreciate my fans,” Anas began, “also my wife and my girlfriend.” Upon realizing his mistake, he quickly backtracked his sentiments and let out a nervous chuckle. “I mean my wife, sorry for saying, I’m so sorry, my wife,” he said. “I love you so much. I love you so much from my heart.” Twitter reacts As expected, the internet was unforgiving of his colossal gaffe and immediately roasted him on Twitter. Screen Grab from Twitter Mohammed Anas: ” if the world knows that you have a wife and a girlfriend, its not cheating” pic.twitter.com/BJcFyOGVRp 
— Prince Matyeka (@princematyeka) March 19, 2017 While others mockingly checked on his well being after the incident. Mohammed Anas dawg how did you sleep? Can your still read this? 
— Purely African (@julakaba) March 19, 2017
